Summary Note:
Victoria Luisa Schwarz and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Vienna. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Victoria Luisa Schwarz is a 52 year old Associate from Austria.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Victoria Luisa Schwarz is married to Krämer. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Victoria graduated from BRG/BORG Marchfeldstraße in 1991.
Victoria completed her university studies at IMC University of Applied Sciences Krems in 1997.
Occupation History:
Victoria Luisa Schwarz is a 52 year old Associate from Austria.
At B&C Private Equity GmbH, Victoria Luisa Schwarz held the position of Analyst from 1996 to 2001, developing essential skills in the field.
At B&C Private Equity GmbH, she held the position of Associate from 2001 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 420000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has house located in Klagenfurt, worth 1420000 EUR.

In 2008, she received an inheritance of 4370000 EUR from her late mother, who was a prominent Investment Banker, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Victoria as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
